node.title: life
node.description: Conway's Game of Life visualizer tool built with Elixir and Scenic

node.title: go-http-server
node.description: HTTP server written from scratch using Go!

node.title: git-guide
node.description: An introduction to the Git version control system. This guide aims to bridge the gap between knowing basic Git commands and properly understanding how they work! The main guide has been completed but new content will still be added!

node.title: woojiahao.github.io
node.description: Personal portfolio site built with Gatsby.js. All the content is stored as files so that the key changes made to the web pages would only involve styling, making the site portable and easy to use.

node.title: govid-19
node.description: API for serving COVID-19 statistics built using Go + Gin. The API uses the open-source COVID-19 statistics dataset from https://github.com/CSSEGISandData/COVID-19

node.title: torrent.go
node.description: Implementation of the BitTorrent protocol in Golang. Everything used in this project has been built from scratch to properly learn how to use the features of Golang. This project currently only supports single-file torrents.

node.title: Meetup
node.description: Discord bot that displays daily programming events happening in Singapore

node.title: kMD2PDF
node.description: Simple and customisable markdown to PDF document conversion library.
